00148 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00149 {
00150     totalTime_ = globalThresholdingTime_ + templateFilteringTime_ + averagingFilteringTime_ + regionsExtractionTime_ + slantingCorrectionTime_;
00151 };
